channel.title: What songs to put on my new iPod Nano?
channel.description:
Well, I'm buying it with my own money, and I'm getting a 2GB iPod Nano. Any ideas of what songs I should get? I like the classic hits, most hits from 2000-2006. Just help me think of some good songs if you can :p (I'm using limewire pro to get the music btw, free songs ftw.)
Happy Holidays

item.title: What songs to put on my new iPod Nano?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Aerosmith
Afroman
Ben harper
Beck
Bob Dylan
Danko Jones(First date, baby hates me, and lover call are all good)
Disturbed(some songs are good)
Eric Pyrdz - Call on me. Listen to this when your high ^ . ^
Guns n Roses
Hinder
Jefferson Airplane / Jefferson Starship
Kottonmouth kings
Lenny Cravitz
Marilyn Manson (Yes he’s a freak, but very few people realise he has god music)
Motley Crue
Nickleback
Nirvana
Papa Roach
Pink Floyd
Queens of the stone age
Red hot chili peppers
Sex pistols
Skid Row
Stone Temple pilots
Styx
Tenacious D
The Offspring
The Who
Tom petty
Velvet Revolver
White Snake
Wolf Mother

And that’s about all I listen to. There might be more.

Read full topic
